page.title: 20THE FUTURE OF THE PEOPLE...
page.content:
It's time the world started thinking about the future people, not just about themselves. The governments go ahead with plans and testing, not thinking about the people of the future, who could suffer for it for centuries after todays people have died, and just because our government today are selfish or careless. We are finding more and more now that one generation's luxury becomes the next generations necessity. The rich are getting richer, the poor poorer and the greedy greedier.
GEORGINA HENDERSON 2H
